summary: This document is an email correspondence indicating that Jeffrey Epstein will be in New York on September 20th and the following week. The email is addressed to Paul Morris and is marked as confidential.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the person who will be in New York on specified dates.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the recipient of the email from which the information about Epstein's schedule is conveyed.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's Visit to New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is scheduled to be in New York on this date.

keyFacts: The email indicates that Jeffrey Epstein will be in New York on September 20th and the following week.
The correspondence is marked as confidential.
The email was sent to Paul Morris.
